quote_last: . The first lot was due to come under the hammer at seven o’clock. He knew exactly how long it would take to walk from the Ritz to Christie’s, and as the Raphael was lot 25, he wasn’t in any hurry.
title: Turn a Blind Eye
author: Jeffrey Archer
